EmailTemplate.name: Carrie - 2011 Ford Fulfillment Promo
EmailTemplate.subject: Vinsolutions has 100% FLM Co-op approval.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Great News! Vinsolutions has 100% FLM Co-op approval. Reach out to your customers and get them into your dealership to take advantage of the great deals on your Ford Certified Pre-owned vehicles.
Take a look at the campaign pieces below and give Carrie Bermel a call for details.
Carrie Bermel Marketing and Retention Manager - Great Lakes, Midstates, NE, SE carrie.bermel@vinsolutions.com O: (800) 980-7488 x 212 C: 612-716-5573
